summary_text: When Manny finds a mysterious collar and puts it on his dog, Rufus, he magically turns into a human boy. Although he doesn't know how to act normal, he becomes the most popular kid in school.

name: Headlock
summary_text: A CIA agent is sent on a mission and ends up in a coma. CIA want to extract intel from his brain a lethal way but his wife says no. His comatose mind is active. She decides to investigate.

name: The Wedding Invitation
summary_text: Three best friends endure heartbreak, humiliation and hangovers to get dates for the wedding of a lifetime.

name: Yeonaeui wondo
summary_text: About a series of relationship between two normal couple in Korea. Break up, get back together, break up again and so on.

name: Lady of Csejte
summary_text: Based on a story of Countess Bathory, a serial killer in 16th century Transylvania who supposedly killed hundreds of children.

name: Rezeta
summary_text: Rezeta tells the story of a jet-setting model who leads a freewheeling and spontaneous life in Mexico City that starts to change when she falls in love with an unexpected young artist

name: Chennaiyil Oru Naal
summary_text: In Chennai, a brain dead accident victim's organs were rushed by road from Chennai to Vellore (170 km).

name: The A-List
summary_text: Eric Schultz, the most popular student at Lake O'Dell High School, is coerced by his guidance counselor, Sylvia Martin, into fulfilling a list of her high school fantasies in order for him to graduate.

name: Tumman veden päällä
summary_text: A ravishing story about little Pete and his survival and growth in the gray area between love and fear.

name: Amen
summary_text: A journey of a Korean girl who wanders around Europe to find her boyfriend.

name: Evil Bong 3: The Wrath of Bong
summary_text: An evil alien bong crashes on earth. Its intent: world domination. Our stoner heroes are sent to the alien bong planet and held captive by nude alien beauties. Their only hope to escape and save planet earth: Eebee, the original Evil Bong.

name: Anaganaga O Dheerudu
summary_text: In a teardrop-shaped land called Sangarashtra, a 9-year-old girl with special healing powers tries to save her homeland from the tyranny of an evil queen with the help of a blind swordsman.

name: Emulsion
summary_text: A man becomes obsessed with finding his missing wife, drowning in the nostalgia of a 16mm home movie of her, and letting his grief gradually consume him until he gets caught up in a sinister occurrence.

name: Sennosc
summary_text: The emotional inertia and chaos affecting a narcoleptic woman, a fatally ill writer and a doctor, and their attempts to escape from their dead-end situations.

name: Beyond the Dream
summary_text: Lok (Chun-Him Lau) is a recovering schizophrenic who yearns for love. One day, he encounters the young and beautiful Yan (Cecilia Choi) and quickly falls in love with her. Just when he ...                See full summary »

name: El cant dels ocells
summary_text: Three wise men embark on a journey to see the newborn Jesus Christ.

name: The Circuit
summary_text: The dynamic between a father and his estranged daughter spills over to the race track, where the duo go head-to-head.

name: The Argument
summary_text: A couple get into an argument at their cocktail party that escalates until it brings an abrupt end to the festivities. They and their guests decide to re-create the entire night again and again to determine who was right.

name: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
summary_text: Serial billionaire kidnapper Logan has been savaging Hong Kong. Now, his gang is aiming the dart beyond Hong Kong, at an affluent Macau regal.

name: Sanky Panky
summary_text: Genaro gets a job at a resort in hopes of marrying an American woman and moving to New York in search of a better life. He meets a tourist called Martha and everything seems going according to plan, until her boyfriend shows up.

name: Rough
summary_text: A diver on the university team must decide which of her two childhood friends she loves, and they're both on the swim team.

name: The Mermaid Chair
summary_text: A married woman (Basinger) falls in love with a Benedictine monk.

name: Confession
summary_text: After school trouble-maker Luther Scott pushes another student to an accidental death, he confesses to Father Kelly and then frames the priest for murder.

name: Everyone
summary_text: The perfect gay couple are having a wedding in their backyard and they've invited the family and all their emotional baggage.

name: The Wooden Camera
summary_text: A township near Cape Town. Two young teens, Madiba and Sipho, find a gun and a camera. Sipho takes the gun, and Madiba the camera, sealing their fate.

name: Christmas Child
summary_text: A life-sized nativity leads a man to learn about his past and lost family.

name: Gangotri

summary_text: Animator Thomas Kempton gets more than he bargained for when a snowmobile trip turns to terror in the wilds of Northern Michigan. Held prisoner by two cannibalistic sisters who try ...                See full summary »

name: The Edelweiss Pirates
summary_text: Cologne-Ehrenfeld, November 1944. They're young, wild and rebellious, like young people anywhere and in any time. But working-class boys Karl and his younger brother Peter are Edelweiss ...                See full summary »

name: Nationale 7
summary_text: A sexual revolution starts in an internment center when an empathetic caretaker takes seriously the claim of a quadriplegic rude and nasty man to visit a prostitute. Should we all be granted sexual rights?

name: Nice Guys Sleep Alone
summary_text: A young man in Louisville sees his dating failures are related to his always being nice. All of his dates end up going with the rude, obnoxious guys. Deciding to change his ways, he goes ...                See full summary »

name: Kiss Toledo Goodbye
summary_text: A man learns that the bio father he knew nothing about is involved in a world of crime. Upon dad's death he is expected to join his new "family."

summary_text: From the Irish countryside to London to New York City and back again, Maggie Sheridan (Dame Helen Mirren) reenters the world as a countess and shady art dealer. With her panache and ...                See full summary »

name: Little Men
summary_text: Based on the classic novel by Louisa May Alcott. When two homeless boys from Boston find themselves at Plumfield, a rural boarding school run by Jo and her husband, the boys learn both academic and life lessons they won't ever forget.

summary_text: Denmark in the 70's. The teenager Christoffer's parents Nisse and Maria have decided to move into a commune because they want to try the alternative lifestyle. But Christoffer doesn't like ...                See full summary »

name: Karniggels
summary_text: The young policeman Koeppe just left the academy and is transferred to a small police station in the countryside. He's a merry guy and dreams of a career, however he's not very bright. A ...                See full summary »

summary_text: Lawrence and Feisal go to argue for Arab independence at the 1919 Paris Peace Conference.

summary_text: An actress starts seeing visions of a witch character called Levana, which she's supposed to play in an upcoming horror movie, and slowly begins to discover a supernatural plot against her life.

name: Ga-ga: Glory to the Heroes
summary_text: In the 21st century, prisoners aboard penitentiary space ships explore unknown worlds.

name: The Boss' Wife
summary_text: Joel Keefer is a stockbroker trying to climb the corporate ladder. There's only one thing stopping him - his boss' beautiful and flirtatious wife.

name: Adventures of the Wilderness Family 3
summary_text: The family who went "back to nature" by homesteading in Colorado's Rocky Mountains is threatened by possible federal opposition to their mining claims on the land they moved to.

name: Pepe, der Paukerschreck - Die Lümmel von der ersten Bank, III. Teil

name: La ligne de démarcation
summary_text: 1941. A little town in the Jura is cut in half by a river that forms the border between Nazi-occupied France and the free zone.

name: I due marescialli
summary_text: September 1943: in the general confusion a thief dressed as a priest and a sergeant exchange clothes and roles.

name: The Paris Express
summary_text: A Dutch company's owner bankrupts his own company, burns the incriminating ledgers and plans to run to Paris with the company payroll but he is caught in the act by his accountant who challenges his actions, leading to a reversal of roles.

name: The Chinese Ring
summary_text: Soon after a Chinese princess comes to the US to buy planes for her people, she is murdered by a poison dart fired by an air rifle.

name: The Power of the Whistler
summary_text: A woman uses a deck of cards to predict death within 24 hours for a stranger sitting at a bar, then tries to help him remember who he is based on items in his pockets.

name: Kentucky
summary_text: Romeo and Juliet story set amidst horse racing in Kentucky. The family feud of lovers Jack and Sally goes back to the Civil War and is kept alive by her Uncle Peter.

summary_text: Two French Foreign Legionnaires are lost amid the shifting sands of the Sahara Desert when they stumble across the entrance to an underground world. Searching this new found subterranean ...                See full summary »

name: The Wicked Gift
summary_text: Ethan is a young, shy and rather reserved designer who has suffered from insomnia for many years due to his terrible nightmares. Believing he has a personality disorder he decides to see a ...                See full summary »

name: Catching Feelings
summary_text: Catching Feelings is a dark romantic comedy which follows an urbane young academic and his beautiful wife, as their lives get turned upside down when a celebrated and hedonistic older writer moves into their Johannesburg home with them.

name: Tharai Thappattai
summary_text: The film is about a man called Sannasi, who heads Thara Thappattai, a Karagattam troupe. Tharai Thappattai exposes how this art is slowly dying, and why we are all the worse for it.

name: Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur
summary_text: David Attenborough follows the remarkable story of the discovery of fossils in the Patagonia region of Argentina which prove to belong to the largest animal to ever walk the Earth.

name: Eetti
summary_text: The world of an athlete who has a rare health condition intersects with that of a gang that specializes in printing counterfeit money. Faced with danger around every corner, the champion sprinter fights back with fervor.

name: 3000 Layla
summary_text: A young Palestinian schoolteacher gives birth to her son in an Israeli prison where she fights to protect him, survive and maintain hope.

name: Heosamgwan maehyeolgi
summary_text: Set in the 1960's, this film is a story about a man without money or plans and his struggles with reality, based on the bestselling novel 'Chronicle of a Blood Merchant'.

name: Dead Draw
summary_text: Someone knows about the 25 million and the plane to Mexico. Someone killed the getaway pilot. As loyalty turns to suspicion and friends become enemies, 4 criminals try to find the rat and escape their past - if they can survive the night.

name: Director's Cut
summary_text: Herbert Blount aspires to replace the real director of a movie and make it his own by capturing the lead actress and inflicting much horror upon her in his version.

name: Lou! Journal infime
summary_text: Lou spends her days eating takeout, playing with her cat and spying on a hunky neighbor, but when her mom falls in love, her life takes a sudden turn.

summary_text: After killing two skinheads in a failed operation against NeoNazis, young undercover intelligence agent Daniel finds a hiding place and new friends in Berlins Turkish Arab community. ...                See full summary »

name: Maria Bamford: The Special Special Special!
summary_text: Spend an intimate evening with Maria Bamford in her cozy 'shot-at-home' comedy special. Gleeful, thrilling, and oh so awkward Maria gets snug with her two person audience consisting of only her parents.

name: Viola
summary_text: A group of actresses performing in a production of Shakespeare's "Twelfth Night" get caught up in a web of romantic intrigue and revelation.

name: Go for Sisters
summary_text: Fontayne is enlisted by Bernice - her estranged old friend and current parole officer - along with a disgraced cop to search for Bernice's son, who went missing on the Mexican border.

name: Kadha Thudarunnu
summary_text: Vijayalakshmi struggles to lead a normal life after the sudden death of her husband. However, meeting Preman, an auto rickshaw driver changes her life for the better.

name: Iti Mrinalini: An Unfinished Letter...
summary_text: An award-winning aging actress reflects on her life while writing a suicide note.

name: Budapest
summary_text: José Costa is a Brazilian ghost writer. Returning from a ghost writers convention his airplane is rerouted to Budapest. His life is also rerouted when he meets Krista and with her help, ...                See full summary »

name: Polar Opposites
summary_text: David Terran wrote scientific theories predicting an inevitable shift in Earth's magnetic poles. Then an Iranian underground nuclear test sets off a global phenomenon that matches David's doomsday scenario.

name: Sam o Nargess
summary_text: Sam and Abd and Omid are three intimate friends. Sam falls in love with sister of Abd Nargess. Then it revealed that Omid is in love with her too. Omid who is jealous goes tell Abd about ...                See full summary »

name: Quincas Berro d'Água
summary_text: Friends of the recently deceased Quincas take their pal's body on one last tour of his favorite spots in Brazil's Bahia.

name: Aruvam
summary_text: A woman who doesn't like harming even an ant is possessed with the ghost of the man who loves her, which wants to take revenge on the corrupt men who murdered him.

name: All About Yves
summary_text: Jerem moved to his grandmother's house to compose a rap record. He meets So, a mysterious investigator on behalf of the start-up Digital Cool, who persuades him to take the test Yves, a ...                See full summary »

name: Born Equal
summary_text: Four characters living in one neighborhood in London - all living dramatically different lives, all of them on the edge - see their stories unfold.

"4:30" traces the relationship between Xiao Wu, an eleven year old Chinese Boy and his tenant Jung, a thirty-something Korean man. Told entirely from the perspective of the boy, Xiao Wu, ...                See full summary »

name: WWE Royal Rumble
summary_text: The biggest Superstars of RAW and SmackDown! clash at Royal Rumble to determine who will go to WrestleMania 21 as the heavyweight contender. The Road to WrestleMania begins as RAW and SmackDown! present WWE Royal Rumble.

name: Soccer Dog: European Cup
summary_text: HE'S GOT THE WORLD BY THE TAIL. Imagine a mutt who can outplay Beckham on the field while turning a team of laughable misfits into a lean mean fighting machine. This pooch has got the international soccer scene by the tail.

name: V dvizhenii
summary_text: Modern Russian take on Felinni's "La Dolce Vita" focuses on a few days from one popular Moscow journalist's life and the essential attributes of his life: Sex, betrayal, love, friendship, murders, etc.

name: When Louis Met... The Hamiltons

name: El Rey
summary_text: Cali, Colombia, 1970s. The fictional story of Pedro Rey, the first drug trafficker and drug lord.

name: Olympiyan Anthony Adam
summary_text: A police officer goes undercover in a school to find a criminal via his kin.

name: The Last Brickmaker in America
summary_text: A man must cope with the loss of his wife and the obsolescence of his job before finding redemption by becoming a role model to an equally lost thirteen-year-old.

name: Rennie's Landing
summary_text: Fate reuintes college friends a year after graduation and they decide to recapture the idealistic spirit of their college days.

name: Prem Aggan

name: Rupan sansei: Dead or Alive
summary_text: When Lupin heads to the kingdom of Zufu to pilfer its treasure, he incurs the wrath of its psychotic ruler General Headhunter, who places a dead-or-alive bounty on his head that many intend to collect.

name: Totò che visse due volte
summary_text: Paletta steals from a shrine to pay a prostitute. Fefè, an aging homosexual, attends his lover's wake and steals his ring. Lazzaro is killed by the mafia. Totò, a humble messiah, resurrects the man, who rushes off to take his revenge.

name: Inside the Labyrinth
summary_text: A behind-the-scenes look at the David Bowie film Labyrinth (1986), also featuring director Jim Henson and co-star Jennifer Connelly.

name: Love Me Deadly
summary_text: A young socialite struggling to control her necrophiliac urges is torn between her affection for a kind businessman and the mortician who supplies her with bodies.

name: K
summary_text: An elderly German tourist is killed in Paris at the hands of Joseph Katz, an old junk dealer beloved by detective Sam Bellamy. Despite witnessing the crime, Sam covers for Joseph, upon which the latter vanishes in mysterious circumstances.

name: To Catch a Yeti
summary_text: While trying to escape hunters, Hank the Yeti finds himself befriending a American family in a big city.

name: N'oublie pas que tu vas mourir
summary_text: Benoit has planned out his life. Unfortunately he has forgotten the military duty. After he is called to duty he tries everything to get around. The story gets even worse as he is told by a military doctor that he is HIV positive.

name: Play Time
summary_text: Lindsey and Geena spend some time together by the pool while their husbands play golf. After talking about their fantasies they begin to enact a few of them for each other. Soon they ...                See full summary »

name: Tikhie stranitsy
summary_text: A hungry, homeless, socially isolated and socially alienated young man living on the streets of an anonymous Russian big city in the 19th Century is looking for answers about himself.

name: Who Do I Gotta Kill?
summary_text: A struggling writer takes a job with the mob to make ends meet.

name: De avonden
summary_text: Frits van Egters' life in the last ten days of the year 1946.

name: Vengeance
summary_text: Tom's parents are killed by Mexican outlaws after their leader (Van Cleef) rapes his mother as he watched. He sets out to exact revenge and is ultimately helped by a successful gold prospector who has been robbed by the same outlaws.

name: Prípad pro zacínajícího kata

name: Rampage
summary_text: In colonial Malaysia, British big game-hunter Otto Abbot and American trapper Harry Stanton clash over the ethics of catching versus killing animals and over Abbot's mistress, Anna.

name: Ring of Fire
summary_text: In the 1960s Oregon, two sheriff deputies arrest three teenagers for robbery but are overpowered and taken hostage while forest fires rage all around them.
